name: Backbone: Prologue
description: Backbone: Prologue is the demo of an upcoming noir-inspired detective adventure. As raccoon private eye Howard Lotor, sniff out clues, collect evidence, interrogate witnesses, and explore beautiful pixel art version of dystopian Vancouver, BC.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Multi-core 2.5GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 or equivalent DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Windows-based sound card
